PackageOracle.name: DA_NON_LINEAR_ENTITLEMENT_TOKE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_NON_LINEAR_ENTITLEMENT_TOKE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.173424000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,non_linear_entitlement_token IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,non_linear_entitlement_token IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_non_linear_entitlement_toke;

body.name: DA_NON_LINEAR_ENTITLEMENT_TOKE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_NON_LINEAR_ENTITLEMENT_TOKE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.184791000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_non_linear_entitlement_toke.add(fx), parms=' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_non_linear_entitlement_token a
(
a.non_linear_entitlement_token
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_non_linear_entitlement_token.NEXTVAL
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.non_linear_entitlement_token INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_non_linear_entitlement_toke.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_non_linear_entitlement_toke.add, parms=' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_non_linear_entitlement_token a
(
a.non_linear_entitlement_token
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_non_linear_entitlement_token.NEXTVAL
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_non_linear_entitlement_toke.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,non_linear_entitlement_token IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_non_linear_entitlement_toke.add, parms=' || non_linear_entitlement_token || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_non_linear_entitlement_token a
(
a.non_linear_entitlement_token
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.non_linear_entitlement_token
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_non_linear_entitlement_toke.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,non_linear_entitlement_token IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_non_linear_entitlement_toke.del, parms=' || non_linear_entitlement_token || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_non_linear_entitlement_token a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.non_linear_entitlement_token = del.non_linear_entitlement_token
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_non_linear_entitlement_toke.del');

END del;

END da_non_linear_entitlement_toke;
